course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Weather Research Forecast Model and Flow Visualization
course.description: The student will learn how to run the Weather Research Forecast (WRF) model to look at marine emissions. He will examine the morphometric data using geographic information system (GIS) tools. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2352 AND MATH 3312 AND COMP 1029J
